titleStmt.title: A measuring rule concerning liberty and persecution and who have been the persecutors and who have been the sufferers from the beginning : also the stock and line from whence the persecutor has had his rise and descent, and of what stock they are that cumber Gods earth.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
